data: Girls, listen—if friend hubby comes home to-night and while hurlin' the cat off his favorite chair, remarks that he’s got a scheme to make gold out of mud or pennant winners out of the St. Looey Cardinals, don’t threaten to leave him flat and accuse him of givin' aid and comfort to the breweries.

Girls, listen--if friend hubby comes home to-night and while hurlin' the cat off his favorite chair, remarks that he's got a scheme to make gold out of mud or pennant winners out of the St. Looey Cardinals, don't threaten to leave him flat and accuse him of givin' aid and comfort to the breweries.
Witwer, H. C. (Harry Charles), 1890-1929; Brown, Arthur William, 1881-1966 [Illustrator]
